title: Can you force yourself to write with your left hand? - Quora

response.answer_text: My son is a chef. He sliced his hand by mistake. He wrote with his left hand to not miss any of his college classes. He was right handed. Now he can write with both hands. Here is a picture of my son for a reference point:  This is when he was 5 years old.  This is my son today with his sister and dad.
